name: LoveBirds
description: LoveBirds is a simple 2 player game where two players must fight in a series of challenges to find which bird best represents 'Love'. There are stages where the two players must fight, using their agility and shields to best their opponent. There are stages where the 2 players must race to the end while trying to subvert their opponent's efforts. More updates coming with new characters and an improves UI system!
